com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Class RecoverDatabaseOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql.RecoverDatabaseOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, RecoverDatabaseOperations

    public class RecoverDatabaseOperationsImpl
extends Object
implements ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, RecoverDatabaseOperations
    Contains the operation to create recovery requests for Azure SQL Databases.

      • create

        public RecoverDatabaseOperationCreateResponse create(String sourceServerName,
                                                     RecoverDatabaseOperationCreateParameters parameters)
                                              throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                                     SAXException,
                                                     TransformerException,
                                                     IOException,
                                                     ServiceException
        Issues a recovery request for an Azure SQL Database.
        Specified by:
        create in interface RecoverDatabaseOperations
        Parameters:
        sourceServerName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the database was hosted.
        parameters - Required. Additional parameters for the Create Recover Database Operation request.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the Create Recover Database Operation request.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was an error configuring the parser for the response body.
        SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the response body.
        TransformerException - Thrown if there was an error creating the DOM transformer.
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
